description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are a rebel warrior imprisoned in The Evil Robot Master's domain.  In order to escape, you must traverse room after room of the electrified wall maze while destroying his robotic minions.  A throwback to classic arcade games, this game will test your reflexes, your skill, and most of all, your sanity!  Are you insane enough to survive?
